duties_responsibilities.duty: Hunting for new business and closing sales deals with a focus on generating high profits.
Building a book of residual income through proactive sales and lead generation activities.
Engaging in face-to-face interactions, networking, and rapidly expanding the client portfolio.
Maintaining client relationships for future revenue growth and renewal.
Leading sales activities and persistent communication to drive business growth.
Participating in critical business discussions regarding promoting and selling products/services.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field (Master's preferred)
